txt.en: 'It never fails. I don't know what it is with some Orcs and bells, but the job is done.\n\n'We can rest easy now that the last of that warband is finished.'
Cúdor has asked you to travel to Gaerlond and find the Orc's armour. Once there, ring the bell he gave you and defeat the Orc.\n\nGaerlond is north-east of Barad Rill.
Cúdor will be thrilled to hear that the threat of the Orcs has stopped here.\n\nCúdor can be found in Barad Rill.
The bell should bring the Orc out of hiding. If you can find their supplies, they will take the bait.\n\nBurnalg has been seen hiding in Gaerlond.'
Talk to Cúdor in Barad Rill
Talk to Cúdor in Barad Rill
'It never fails. I don't know what it is with some Orcs and bells, but the job is done.\n\n'We can rest easy now that the last of that warband is finished.'
Cúdor has tracked the last of the Orc war band to Gaerlond and has asked you to finish them.

'Well met, [placeholder].

'I knew we'd meet again. I tracked a band of Orcs from Tumladen. The trail has led me here.

'Inside Gaerlond, a lone Orc has taken up shelter. They most likely plan to flee to Ringlo Vale. The Darkwaters haunting Gaerlond act as a natural barrier between them and those who would pursue.

'Lure him out using this bell. This Orc is particularly fond of it.'
Talk to Cúdor in Barad Rill
